suite.name: Test Scouts App Rf

test.name: Login to the system with valid user data

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Scouts panel - sign in'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.name: Login to the system with invalid user data

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Scouts panel - sign in'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[contains(text(),'password invalid')]' contains exact text 'Identifier or password invalid.'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.name: Login to the system with empty email and password

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Scouts panel - sign in'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: Please provide your username or your e-mail.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[contains(text(),'provide your username')]' contains exact text 'Please provide your username or your e-mail.'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
